explains: n. [林] 灌木丛；丛林；错综复杂

sentences.en: In front of the door he observed a bird which had caught itself in the thicket.
sentences.cn: 在门前，他看见了一只鸟被困在灌木丛中。

sentences.en: The hidden things silence revealed: a pheasant craning its neck to spy on us from a thicket, a crow hopping from branch to branch, a raccoon snoring in den.
sentences.cn: 他们指给我那些原本隐藏起来、却被寂静暴露了的东西：一头野鸡从灌木丛中伸长脖子打探我们，一只乌鸦在树枝间跳来跳去，一只浣熊在它的窝里打鼾。

sentences.en: I leapt over the tree because the huntsmen are shooting down there in the thicket.
sentences.cn: 我跳过了树顶，因为有猎人们正在林子里开枪。
